summary: "The Diary of Anne Frank" is a famous book written by Anne Frank while hiding from the Nazis in World War II. She wrote in her diary for two years before her family was caught in 1944. Anne died in a concentration camp, but her diary was saved. After the war, her father, the only survivor, published it. The diary has been translated into many languages and made into a play and movie. It's one of the most known books of the 20th century.
title: The Diary of a Young Girl
